name: BNNSLayerParametersLossYolo
desc: A structure that contains the parameters of a You Only Look Once (YOLO) loss layer.

items.name: init(function: BNNSLossFunction, i_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, o_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, reduction: BNNSLossReductionFunction, huber_delta: Float, number_of_grid_columns: Int, number_of_grid_rows: Int, number_of_anchor_boxes: Int, anchor_box_size: Int, rescore: Bool, scale_xy: Float, scale_wh: Float, scale_object: Float, scale_no_object: Float, scale_classification: Float, object_minimum_iou: Float, no_object_maximum_iou: Float, anchors_data: UnsafeMutablePointer<Float>)
items.desc: Returns a new You Only Look Once (YOLO) loss layer parameters structure from the specified parameters.

items.name: var function: BNNSLossFunction
items.desc: The function that’s used to compute loss.

items.name: var reduction: BNNSLossReductionFunction
items.desc: The function that’s used to reduce the computed loss (must be sum reduction for YOLO).

items.name: var huber_delta: Float
items.desc: A value that’s interpreted as width-height loss.

items.name: var number_of_grid_columns: Int
items.desc: The number of columns in the grid.

items.name: var number_of_grid_rows: Int
items.desc: The number of rows in the grid.

items.name: var number_of_anchor_boxes: Int
items.desc: The number of anchor boxes in each cell.

items.name: var anchor_box_size: Int
items.desc: The size of the anchor box.

items.name: var rescore: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether to rescore confidence according to prediction verus ground truth Intersection Over Union (IOU).

items.name: var scale_xy: Float
items.desc: The value that specifies the x, y loss-scaling factor.

items.name: var scale_wh: Float
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether to rescore confidence according to prediction verus ground truth Intersection Over Union (IOU).

items.name: var scale_object: Float
items.desc: The value that specifies the object confidence loss-scaling factor.

items.name: var scale_no_object: Float
items.desc: The value that specifies the no-object confidence scaling factor.

items.name: var object_minimum_iou: Float
items.desc: The value that specifies intersection over union (IOU) that’s the minimum the function treats as an object.

items.name: var no_object_maximum_iou: Float
items.desc: The value that specifies intersection over union (IOU) that’s the maximum the function treats as not an object.

items.name: var scale_classification: Float
items.desc: The value that specifies the classification scaling factor.

items.name: var anchors_data: UnsafeMutablePointer<Float>
items.desc: Maximum IOU for treating as no object.
